mapper.select: select vre.FPKID as value, vre.FExpressDesc as name, vre.FExpressCode as code from Vie_RS_Express vre

choose.when: select distinct vrc.fprovince as title, value = 'fprovince' from vie_rs_cities vrc where vrc.farea = #{value}
select distinct vrc.fregion as title, value = 'fregion' from vie_rs_cities vrc where vrc.fprovince = #{value}
select vrc.fcity as title, value = 'fcity' from vie_rs_cities vrc where vrc.fregion = #{value}
choose.otherwise: select distinct vrc.farea as title, value = 'farea' from vie_rs_cities vrc

mapper.select: select vrc.* from vie_rs_cities vrc where vrc.${selectValue} like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{inputValue}), '%')
